rukus.text: vellahu feddale ba`dakum `ala ba`din fi-rrizk. feme-llezine fuddilu biraddi rizkihim `ala ma meleket eymanuhum fehum fihi sevaun. efebini`meti-llahi yechadun
vellahu ce`ale lekum min enfusikum ezvacev vece`ale lekum min ezvacikum benine vehafedetev verazekakum mine-ttayyibat. efebilbatili yu'minune vebini`meti-llahi hum yekfurun
veya`budune min duni-llahi ma la yemliku lehum rizkam mine-ssemavati vel'ardi sey'ev vela yesteti`un
fela tadribu lillahi-l'emsal. inne-llahe ya`lemu veentum la ta`lemun
darabe-llahu meselen `abdem memlukel la yakdiru `ala sey'iv vemer razaknahu minna rizkan hasenen fehuve yunfiku minhu sirrav vecehra. hel yestevun. elhamdu lillah. bel ekseruhum la ya`lemun

vedarabe-llahu meseler raculeyni ehaduhuma ebkemu la yakdiru `ala sey'iv vehuve kellun `ala mevlahu eynema yuveccihhu la ye'ti bihayr. hel yestevi huve vemey ye'muru bil`adli vehuve `ala siratim mustekim
